name: ACATECH AVIATION COLLEGE
about: ACATECH Aviation College in Papua New Guinea is a premier institution dedicated to providing high-quality aviation education. Established in 2018 and recognized by the Civil Aviation Safety Authority of PNG, the college offers a range of courses including Diploma in Aircraft Maintenance Engineering, Aviation Electronics Engineering, Private Pilot License, Commercial Pilot License, Instrument Rating, and Type-Rating Courses for airline operators such as Boeing 737 NG and ATR 42/72. With expert instructors from the Philippines and advanced training equipment, ACATECH aims to produce world-class professionals who contribute to national development. The college is also certified as a CASA Part 145 Maintenance Organization and is in the process of obtaining Part 135 Air Operation certification. ACATECH is committed to providing a challenging and supportive environment, ensuring students are adequately trained for successful careers in aviation.
services:

Cabin Maintenance Course
